data.title: University PC Care - Greenville, NC Computer Repair
data.text:
With Mac Care we are bringing proactive maintenance and support to your Apple computer.

Software support, Anti-Virus and maintenance all rolled into one package for a low monthly fee - for your ultimate peace of mind. Let us take care of you.

For one low monthly fee you get the following great features

Managed Antivirus Included

We provide a subscription to an industry leading Antivirus software. We make sure it stays up to date and worry-free.

Support for Peripherals

As an added bonus we include support for any attached peripherals, such as printers, scanners, and external hard drives.

Yearly Mac OS Upgrade Assistance

Every year as Apple releases an update for Mac OS we will check all hardware, backup and assist with the upgrade process. This is all part of Mac Care.

Self Led Training

We give Mac Care subscribers access to PC Care University which has self-led lessons on hot topics including Email Phishing, Social Media Phishing and many social engineering techniques criminals use.

Remote Support

Have an issue? Think you have a virus? We will help you remotely over the internet at no extra charge.*

Expedited On-site Dispatch

If we are unable to resolve an issue remotely, we can offer expedited on-site dispatch of a technician.**

Extend Mac Care to multiple devices with a Personal Care Plan

Protect your personal devices under one plan.

$40/month or $440/year

Protect all your devices for your family under one plan.

$50/month or $550/year

This sounds great! What does it cost?

Yearly

Monthly

Pay Yearly and Receive 2 Free Months

Mac Care

200year

Expedited Dispatch for On-Site Service

Access to PC Care University (Self-led Training)

Support for Peripherals (Printers, Scanners, etc.)

Mac Care + Backup

300year

Support for Peripherals (Printers, Scanners, etc.)

*Remote Support: Remote Support must be scheduled and is not offered as same day service. If same day service is requested, there is an additional fee for urgent service.

**Expedited On-Site Dispatch: PC Care does not include On-Site service. We waive the urgent dispatch but the customer must pay for the service call.
